mapper.sql: id, user_id, option_time, option_url, option_value, option_info
mapper.select:
SELECT su.NAME name, su.USER_ID userId, ol.option_value optionValue, ol.option_time optionTime, su.MOBILE mobile FROM sys_option_log ol LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON ol.user_id = su.USER_ID where 1=1
and option_time <=#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and option_time >=#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and su.projectName like CONCAT('%',#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by ol.option_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_option_log
id,
user_id,
option_time,
option_url,
option_value,
option_info,

#{optionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update sys_option_log
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_time = #{optionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
option_url = #{optionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_value = #{optionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
option_info = #{optionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_option_log set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_time = #{optionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, option_url = #{optionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_value = #{optionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, option_info = #{optionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
